name: Music Racing GT: EDM & Cars
description:
Drag and Move your car to catch the EDM rhythm!


Tired of traditional music games? Music Racing GT will give you a totally different experience! Relax and challenge yourself, become a professional music racing driver here! Join us to feel the excitement of driving! Beat the hit music and keep racing!

How to play:
• Drag your car to move with EDM music
• Do not miss any rhythm and pay attention to the roadblocks!
• Hit more music cubes to gain a higher score!
• Collect more coins to unlock more Songs and Cars!

Game features:
• FREE to download and play.
• FREE to unlock all the Songs and Cars.
• Easy to play, only one finger needed to control your car.
• Variety of music, from CLASSIC music to HOT pop music.
• Plenty of Cars, pick your own car and begin the race.
• Amazing 3D scenes and lighting effects.
• New songs and new cars added REGULARLY.

Do not hesitate to play Music Racing GT, enjoy the exciting race and EDM music right now! Come on! Drive, drift, leap and have great fun in the rhythm.

If any music producers or labels have a problem with the music and images used in the game, or any players have any advice to help us improve, please feel free to contact us at adaricmusic@gmail.com
